welcome-to-vendor: Hello, Do you want to run your own store on Freshcart? then join us:
short-deliver: Deliver your order to your doorstep in the shortest possible time from your nearest FreshCart pickup stores.
cashback-suggestions: Cheaper prices than your local supermarket, great cashback offers to top it up. Get the best deals and offers.
products-5000: Choose from over 5000 products in food, personal care, household, bakery, veg and non-veg and other categories.
satisfaction: Not satisfied with the product? Return it at your doorstep and get your money back within hours. No questions asked policy.
